text.div:
Chlamydia trachomatis Infection (Tests for Chlamydia species by Culture and Identification Method)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    24005-1 Chlamydia sp identified in Bronchial specimen by Organism specific culture
    45097-3 Chlamydia sp identified in Anal by Organism specific culture
    45098-1 Chlamydia sp identified in Cervix by Organism specific culture
    45099-9 Chlamydia sp identified in Body fluid by Organism specific culture
    45100-5 Chlamydia sp identified in Vaginal fluid by Organism specific culture
    45101-3 Chlamydia sp identified in Nasopharynx by Organism specific culture
    556-1 Chlamydia sp identified in Conjunctival specimen by Organism specific culture
    557-9 Chlamydia sp identified in Genital specimen by Organism specific culture
    558-7 Chlamydia sp identified in Throat by Organism specific culture
    559-5 Chlamydia sp identified in Urethra by Organism specific culture
    560-3 Chlamydia sp identified in Unspecified specimen by Organism specific culture
    6348-7 Chlamydia sp identified in Sputum by Organism specific culture
